revised_title: Perturbation Calculations of Properties in the Helium Iso-Electronic Sequence
tldr: The authors used perturbation theory to calculate the magnetic susceptibilities and dipole polarizabilities of the ground states in the helium iso-electronic sequence. They also calculated mass polarization, relativistic, and radiative corrections to their energies. The hydrogenic approximation was applied to the helium iso-electronic sequence, and the authors discussed the convergence of quantities depending on the first-order correction to the wave function.
